statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-5 \, x^{3} + 5 \, x^{2} - 6 \, x - 4 , -14 \, x^{3} + 22 \, x^{2} - 18 \, x , 2 \, x^{3} - 6 \, x^{2} + 3 \, x - 4 , -2 \, x^{3} + 5 \, x^{2} + 3 \, x - 2 , -18 \, x^{3} + 34 \, x^{2} - 24 \, x + 8\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
